title: Design for Grand Central Terminal, New York City: Facade
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
description: A front elevation of lower and upper story is shown, with staircase leading up to the main entrance at center.  Five bays, alternately of different sizes, are placed between the corner projections. Roof ornamentation suggested at upper center of upper story.  Caption and date inscribed below image at right.
name: Drawing
